transcript:
Customer: Hello. 
Executive: Ji Ramchandra ji baat kar rahe hai right sir?
Customer: Ji Ramchandra ji baat kar rahe hai kya sir?
Executive: Sir mai Sunil Prakash baat kar raha hu branch manager IndiaMART se.
Customer: Ha boliye.
Executive: Sir aapne inquiry buyleads ke liye yaha pe complaint raise kiya tha sir isiliye call kiya mai.
Customer: Ha ha.
Executive: Maine complaint ki aapko October ko.
Customer: Sir bataiye matlab service kaun use karega aap use karenge kaun use karega service?
Executive: Mai use karunga mai.
Executive: Aap hi use karenge sir?
Customer: Thik hai.
Executive: To to sir ye mujhe bataiye aapko IndiaMART aapke mobile app pe hai ya nahi hai? Aap kaise chalayenge mobile se chalayenge ya laptop pe chalayenge?
Customer: Mobile se mobile se mobile se.
Executive: Mobile se chalayenge? Thik hai sir. Mobile open kariye ek baar sir aap apna.
Customer: Sir mai abhi khana kha raha hu sir 15 minute baad call karo sir aap. Promotion.
Executive: Kab call karu aapko?
Customer: 10 minute baad mai khana kha raha hu abhi to 10 minute baad call kariye aap thoda.
Executive: Thik hai sir 10 minute baad call kar leta hu aapko.
Customer: Ha thik hai 10 minute baad khana mai kha raha hu sir.
Executive: Sahi hai sahi hai kha lijiye.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer raised a complaint for inquiry buyleads.

- Wants to know who will use the service.

- Customer is currently eating food.



Resolution:

- Executive confirmed customer will use the service.

- Executive asked customer to open the mobile app.

- Agreed to call back after 10 minutes.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call back after 10 minutes.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, complaint, mobile app
